properties.name: Dopolan bauxite deposit, Kiar County, Chaharmahal and Bakhtiari Province, Iran
properties.description:
Dopolan bauxite deposit, Kiar County, Chaharmahal and Bakhtiari Province, Iran

Type: 56

Location: Iran

The Dopolan bauxite deposit has an estimated reserve of 8–15 million tons with an average grade of 45% Al2O3. The Dopolan bauxite deposit show that the bauxite formed as a continental deposit filling karstic cavities at the boundary of the Khaneh–Kat a...
